attributes.action: Build a Nordic Ásatrú Temple in Yorkshire.
attributes.additional_details:
To the people, whomever you may be, I ask you, please sign. All others have their religious freedoms and we wish to have the same. Many of us still practice our heathen ways and deserve a place to call our own. A place to perform marrage, rituals, celebrations and to honour our ancestors.

To the government, consider our request. It is in our ancestry and part of who we are, whether you believe in the old Gods or not. 

Thank you.

May the Gods favour us and this petition.

Hail Odin!
attributes.background: Ásatrú is the the belief in the Gods. Predating modern dominant religions of today. Ásatrú is a form of Paganism, the belief of the Gods like Odin, Thor and Freyja and many more.

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for building places of worship.
